commit_message: Expose a histogram barmode option so users can choose how histogram traces are displayed (overlay, stack, or group). Updates include: adding histogramBarmode to the PlotLayout store with a default of 'overlay' and a setter; adding a UI select in PlotLayout.tsx (visible for plotType === 'histogram') with local state sync and saving behavior; and passing histogramBarmode into generatePlotConfig to drive Plotly's barmode. This enables persisting and applying the chosen histogram layout mode.
